data.meta_description: LANDAU MARTIN: (1928-2017) American actor, Academy Award winner for Best Supporting Actor in 1994 for his role as Bela Lugosi in Ed Wood. Signed 10 x 8 photograph of Landau standing outdoors in a half-length pose in costume from his Oscar winning performance as the washed-up horror legend Bela Lugosi, alongside Johnny Depp, in costume as the cult filmmaker Ed Wood in a scene from the biographical comedy-drama film Ed Wood. Signed by Landau in bold blue ink with his name alone to the lower white border. EX
